data.eml:eml: Two new species of Leporinus Agassiz, 1929 (Characiformes: Anostomidae) from tributaries of the lower Amazon basin in Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Birindelli, José L. O., Teixeira, Tulio F., Britski, Heraldo A. (2016): Two new species of Leporinus Agassiz, 1929 (Characiformes: Anostomidae) from tributaries of the lower Amazon basin in Brazil. Zootaxa 4178 (1): 97-115, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4178.1.4
